name: Alphabet Shoot 1st Edition 2022
description:
https://youtu.be/EWPoPSlz1nohttps://www.tiktok.com/@neversatisfied1/video/7033958643460541701?lang=en&is_cop...

A retro type video arcade game with a twist solve the phrase before the reactor overheats then....  Also added a touch of Christmas!

OBJECT:  Shoot and solve, before reactor overheats of course, try to hit the letters in the phrase.  Go through levels gain extra points in bonus rounds. Rack enough points to get an extra ship. And when the $ signs show up try to shoot them too, especially in the bonus rounds! There's lots of phrases to solve and points to pile up!!!

CONTROLS: To move ship left or right press- Left and Right Arrows, to shoot SPACEBAR that's it.

press P to pause, C to continue and Q to quit

CREDITS: This game was written by Jody Moesta aka  Never Satisfied in Python

                      Words and Music by  Jody Moesta aka  Never Satisfied

                     

HINTS: Shoot the heck of everything and see what unfolds in the phrase watch your  be sure n go after pop letters like a,e,i,o, t,s,r,n, etc but watch your reactor temperature!
